Html:
I downloaded the latest release less than two weeks ago.

When running in debug and when I close the program it can take several seconds for the program to close.

I'm using gMapControl1.CacheLocation.

I noticed the more I move the map around the longer it takes to close.

I have to press Shift+F5 to get back to Visual Studio.

This is just an annoyance and nothing more. But it would be nice if I knew how to stop it. It's been going on for years.

Something I can put in FormClosing( ) to stop it?

Thanks
